awd_titl_txt: Proton-Antiproton Total and Elastic Cross-Sections at Very  High Energies
awd_abstract_narration: This grant will support completion of the data analysis                    and publication of all results from Experiment E710 at                          Fermilab, (pp elastic scattering and total cross sections at                    energies up to  s = 1.8 TeV).  During the second and third                      years of the grant the group will start a new experiment to                     improve the measurement of the ratio of real to imaginary                       forward scattering amplitude at the full energy of the Fermilab                 Tevatron, as well, as a much improved measurement of the total                  cross section.  A small group of physicists, consisting of one                  faculty member, one research associate and one student, is                      continuing its research in elementary particle physics.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
